page.title: 13SPORTS FACILITIES.
page.content: Recreation facilities are well provided for with a 9 hole golf course which incidentally is situated on either side of the main road through the area. Plus a cricket club, tennis club and football field (belonging to Marsden Football Club whose main site is in the town). All these clubs are open to visitors. Originally these facilities were provided by the major woollen mill owner, Crowthers for the use of the people of Marsden. There is also a children's recreation park. So everyone is catered for.
